Test Name: Immunoglobulin Heavy-Chain (IGH) Hypermutation (IGH V Region) Sequencing
Specimen Type: Genomic DNA from lymphoid tissue, peripheral blood, or bone marrow
Purpose: To assess somatic hypermutation status in the IGH V region for diagnosis and monitoring of hematological conditions.
Container: Microcentrifuge tube containing extracted genomic DNA (nuclease-free)
Equipment: Calibrated thermocycler, agarose gel electrophoresis system with UV transilluminator, purification system (silica column or magnetic beads), Sanger DNA sequencer, bioinformatics software workstation
